titleStmt.title: A sermon very notable, fruictefull, and godlie made at Paules crosse the. xii. daie of Noue[m]bre, in the first yere of the gracious reigne of our Souereigne ladie Quene Marie her moste excellente highnesse, by Iames Brokis Doctor of Diuinitie, [and] master of Bailye College in Oxforth, with certein additions, whiche he at the tyme of vttering, for auoidyng of tediousnes, was faine to omitte.
titleStmt.author: Brooks, James, 1512-1560.

titleStmt.title: A sermon very notable, fruictefull, and godlie made at Paules crosse the. xii. daie of Noue[m]bre, in the first yere of the gracious reigne of our Souereigne ladie Quene Marie her moste excellente highnesse, by Iames Brokis Doctor of Diuinitie, [and] master of Bailye College in Oxforth, with certein additions, whiche he at the tyme of vttering, for auoidyng of tediousnes, was faine to omitte.
titleStmt.author: Brooks, James, 1512-1560.

publicationStmt.publisher: Within the late dissolued house, of the Graie friers, by Roberte Caly,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
